en: Strive thou, O Jehovah, with them that strive with me: Fight thou against them that fight against me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, a mi thawtuhai chu nangin thaw la, A mi dotuhai chu nangin do rawh.

en: Take hold of shield and buckler, And stand up for my help.
hmr: Phaw chîn le phaw lien chel la, Mi ṭhangpui dingin ngîr rawh.

en: Draw out also the spear, and stop the way against them that pursue me: Say unto my soul, I am thy salvation.
hmr: Fei le hreipui chu inlet la, A mi hnawttuhai lampui chu lo dang la, Ka hringna kuoma hin, “I sandamna ka nih,” ti rawh.

en: Let them be put to shame and brought to dishonor that seek after my soul: Let them be turned back and confounded that devise my hurt.
hmr: Ka hringna sukbo tuma zawngtuhai chu, sukmuolphoa sukzakin umhai sienla, Mi suksietna ding ngaituotuhai chu intlânsiettirin thuokdawngtakin um raw se.

en: Let them be as chaff before the wind, And the angel of Jehovah driving them on.
hmr: LALPA vântirkoin khal peiin, Busî thli ilên angin um raw se.

en: Let their way be dark and slippery, And the angel of Jehovah pursuing them.
hmr: LALPA vântirkoin hnawt pei sien, An lampui chu inthimtak le innâltak ni raw se.

en: For without cause have they hid for me their net in a pit; Without cause have they digged a pit for my soul.
hmr: A san um loin, an mi âwkna dingin an lên chu khura chun an pha inrûk a, A san um loin ka hringna tlâk- na dingin khur an cho sih a.

en: Let destruction come upon him unawares; And let his net that he hath hid catch himself: With destruction let him fall therein.
hmr: Ân ringnaw kârin sietna a chungah tlung sienla; A lên pha rûka khan ama ngei âwk bawk sienla: Chutaka chun tla se dêr raw se.

en: And my soul shall be joyful in Jehovah: It shall rejoice in his salvation.
hmr: Chuongchun, ka hringna hi LALPAA chun hlim a ta; A sandamnaa chun lâwm a tih.

en: All my bones shall say, Jehovah, who is like unto thee, Who deliverest the poor from him that is too strong for him, Yea, the poor and the needy from him that robbeth him?
hmr: Ka ru po po hin, “LALPA, mi rimsi, a khing zo ruolloa inthawka sanhimtu, Anih, rimsi le pasie, ama inram hlaktua inthawka sanhimtu, Nang ang hrim tu am um?” tîng a tih.

en: Unrighteous witnesses rise up; They ask me of things that I know not.
hmr: Hretu fel nawtakhai an hung tho a, Ka thil hriet dêr naw thua dâm an mi suosal a.

en: They reward me evil for good, To the bereaving of my soul.
hmr: Ka hringna khawm beidawng dêr khawpin, Thil ṭha thil suolin an mi thung a.

en: But as for me, when they were sick, my clothing was sackcloth: I afflicted my soul with fasting; And my prayer returned into mine own bosom.
hmr: Kei ruok chu, an damnaw lai chun ka silfên chu saiip a na, Ka hringna hi bu ngheiin ka suk rimsi sih a; Lungse taka kûnin ka ṭawngṭai a,

en: I behaved myself as though it had been my friend or my brother: I bowed down mourning, as one that bewaileth his mother.
hmr: Ka ruol amanih, ka unau amani chunga chun ka um dân ding ang takin ka um a; Kân lawn vêl chu khuo khawm ngha ngam loa ngûiin. Mi a nu ṭâtu angin sûnin ka kûn a.

en: But in mine adversity they rejoiced, and gathered themselves together: The abjects gathered themselves together against me, and I knew it not; They did tear me, and ceased not:
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ka chan a sein anni chu an lâwm a, an inhâwr khâwm hiel a, Mi suol teplohai chu mi thaw dingin an inkhâwm a, chu chu ka lo hriet si nawh. Ma nuom loin an mi sawisa hrep a.

en: Like the profane mockers in feasts, They gnashed upon me with their teeth.
hmr: Ruoiṭhenaa nuiza fiemthu hriltuhai ang mei meiin, An ha an mi râwt khum a.

en: Lord, how long wilt thou look on? Rescue my soul from their destructions, My darling from the lions.
hmr: LALPA, nangin ieng chen am i en ding a na? Ka hringna hi suksiet an tumnaa inthawk chun sansuok la; Ka nei suntak hi sakeibakneia inthawk chun sansuok rawh.

en: I will give thee thanks in the great assembly: I will praise thee among much people.
hmr: Inkhâwmna ropuitaka chun lâwmthu hril ka ti cheh a, Mi tamtak laia chun inpâk ka ti che.

en: Let not them that are mine enemies wrongfully rejoice over me; Neither let them wink with the eye that hate me without a cause.
hmr: Ka hmêlmahai chun indiknaw- takin mi diriem naw raw hai se, Ieng ni loa a mi theidatuhai chu an mitin inbe naw bawk raw hai se.

en: For they speak not peace; But they devise deceitful words against them that are quiet in the land.
hmr: Inremna thu hrim an hril si nawh a, Hi rama um ṭawk ṭawkin hlêmna thuhai an ngaituo lem a nih.

en: Yea, they opened their mouth wide against me; They said, Aha, aha, our eye hath seen it.
hmr: Anih, an bauin an mi kâk khum puou a, “Chei! Chei! ei mit ngeiin ei hmu tah,” an tih a.

en: Thou hast seen it, O Jehovah; keep not silence: O Lord, be not far from me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nangin i hmuh a, tosan naw rawh, Aw LALPA, mîn hlat naw rawh.

en: Stir up thyself, and awake to the justice due unto me, Even unto my cause, my God and my Lord.
hmr: Ka Pathien le ka LALPA, ka ro rêl dingin, Anih, ka thuha mi ṭan ding- in, insukhar la, meng rawh.

en: Judge me, O Jehovah my God, according to thy righteousness; And let them not rejoice over me.
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, i felna ang peiin ro mi rêlpêk la, Anni chun mi diriem naw raw hai se.

en: Let them not say in their heart, Aha, so would we have it: Let them not say, We have swallowed him up.
hmr: An lungrilin, “Chei! chuong ang chu a ni annâwm ei dit chu,” ti naw raw se. “Ama chu ei lem zo tah,” ti naw bawk raw se.

en: Let them be put to shame and confounded together that rejoice at my hurt: Let them be clothed with shame and dishonor that magnify themselves against me.
hmr: Ka sietna chunga lâwmhai chu muolphotak le thuokdawng- takin um hai sienla, Ka chunga insuklienhai chu muolphona le inzakna insiltirin um raw se.

en: Let them shout for joy, and be glad, that favor my righteous cause: Yea, let them say continually, Jehovah be magnified, Who hath pleasure in the prosperity of his servant.
hmr: Ka felna chunga lâwmhai chu hlima khêkin lâwmtakin um sienla, Anih, “A siehlaw vângneina chunga lâwm hlak LALPA chu, Chawimawiin um raw se,” ti rawp raw hai se.

en: And my tongue shall talk of thy righteousness And of thy praise all the day long.
hmr: Chuongchun, ka lei hin i felna thu hril a ta, Nangma inpâkna thu khawm sûnnithlâkin hril bawk a tih.
